Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.provider.WeatherProviderFactory
    You shouldn't use this class anymore to instantiate a weather provider from 1.4. Use instead WeatherClient.ClientBuilder
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.createProvider(IProviderType, WeatherConfig)
    Version 1.4 use instead WeatherClient.ClientBuilder
    com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.client.volley.WeatherClientDefault.getCurrentCondition(String, WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
    use instead WeatherClient.getCurrentCondition(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
    com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.StandardHttpClient.getCurrentCondition(String, WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
    use instead WeatherClient.getCurrentCondition(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
    com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.client.okhttp.WeatherDefaultClient.getCurrentCondition(String, WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
    use instead WeatherClient.getCurrentCondition(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
    com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.getCurrentCondition(String, WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
    1.5.0 Use instead WeatherClient.getCurrentCondition(com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.request.WeatherRequest, com.survivingwithandroid.weather.lib.WeatherClient.WeatherEventListener)
